title: Sir Andrew Wylie of that Ilk
description: Sir Andrew Wylie of that Ilk is a story about the rise of a Scotsman to wealth, social prestige and political influence in London. The early chapters dealing with Wylie's childhood in Ayrshire are autobiographical.Galt had intended that Sir Andrew Wylie should be a sketch, but his publisher, William Blackwood, persuaded him to expand it into a three volume novel, something he later regretted.
author: John Galt
